website_summaries.verdict: A versatile and affordable option with a high-end finish and spacious interior. Exceptional value.
pros: Clean, simplistic design with a surprising number of compartments, pockets, and twin fold-out panels
Comes with a convenient mini travel case
Velvet lining has a luxurious feel
Lockable clasp for added confidence and security
cons: The lock could be a bit more robust, but for most, this isn't a major issue

customer_reviews.title: Great Jewelry Box!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this jewelry box! The product dimensions are spot on, the color is solid black and it looks very nice. The interior looks exactly like the pictures. The little lock that allows you to open and close the lid seems sturdy enough. It has a button snap on the left and right side of the box that gives you access to where you can hang your necklaces and they won't get tangled. The ring holders keep my rings in place nicely too.
customer_reviews.author: WatchTheShow

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase, cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review ever and just want to say do not purchase this jewelry box. Poor quality, bottom was not glued to box, a piece was broken and they just shoved the broken piece into a space between the outside wall and inside wall. Not even worth $5 at a yard sale!
customer_reviews.author: S. Bielaczyc

customer_reviews.title: I cannot express just how happy I am with this product
customer_reviews.text: I cannot express just how happy I am with this product. Again I bought this for my Grand Daughters first jewelry box, she is 12 years old and just started wearing jewelry and I wanted something she could have for a long time. This is a Christmas present but I couldn't resist looking at it first. It is so well made and has everything in it that she needs to keep her jewelry nice and organized. The travel case is such a nice add on piece. She is just going to love it. Thank you so so much.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Walters

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, Well Designed Jewelry Box
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the ivory shade of this jewelry case- faux leather. It looks beautiful on my dresser, and has a lock. The medium size is designed to hold rings, bracelets, and watches. I didn’t like the holders for earrings, made of cardboard with small holes. Not a good choice either if you have many necklaces, especially longer ones. I still need additional containers for my jewelry collection but like the lock on this box to store more fine jewelry although it would probably be easy to open anyway as it is very tiny. I like this case, but it could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Daisydee

customer_reviews.title: Songmics jewelry box, black
customer_reviews.text: Not as spacious as it seems. The boxes inside compartments take up a lot of space. I have more earrings and necklaces, but it seems like it’s geared towards rings and plain chains. I like to see the charms on my necklaces, so when they hang into the pouch it’s inconvenient. I like how it folds into a clean compact box. With a little tweaking it serves its purpose for me, but I’m not a huge jewelry person. If you are and need easy access and visualization or simply have a lot to store, you may want to reconsider.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: I Enjoy it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this jewelry box. It looks fancy and it fits my jewelry. I should say though that it's mainly targeted towards storing rings and earrings rather than bracelets and long necklace so I decided to buy another box (another brand) and the two of them work great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Emma's mami

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as shown, it is a nice size, and my daughter loves it! Price is fair and shipping is quick! Lots of space for all her rings, bracelets, and necklaces. Having the extra travel box is what really sold us on this specific box and she can fit a week's worth of accessories for traveling and keeps everything organized. Recommended item and seller! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: A.S. Johnson, author

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jewelry box. It is so easy to move from room to room, as well as take on vacation with me. Even though I have a larger more solid jewelry box this one's still sit on the vanity. The only issue is that the drawers sometimes don't line up so if you take a drawer completely out it may be difficult to put it back in, but still completely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: MarittaM

customer_reviews.title: Nice! (UPDATED 6/8/18)
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for granddaughter. Will give it to her tomorrow. Seems sturdy. Heavier than expected. Love the travel case! UPDATE: She was absolutely thrilled with it! Loves that it locks and has "secret compartments! 😉 The small travel case that came with it was a big hit as well. Only thing I would change is make the lid/top stay up a bit better. It tends to want to close on it's own. The front of the chest comes down when you open the case so be prepared for that. She thought it was a great place to set her earrings while changing them so they don't get lost.
customer_reviews.author: M. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Jewelry Box!
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry box is so well-organized! There is a place for everything, and each item displays very nicely. I wasn't sure about the watch feature, but I use both of them too. The dust covers are a big plus for jewelry care. It is such a pleasure to put on my jewelry each morning. I can easily see all my pieces. The outside is very plain, but that is how I like it. The inside is lined with a soft, microfiber type of material which keeps each item in its place. All of the drawers glide in and out smoothly, and the side flaps are a nice bonus for necklace and bracelet organization. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kelbrew1

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this!! Got this as a gift for my sister but her husband got her a jewelry box also so he asked that I return this one. I am begrudgingly doing so. Although I think he should return his and buy her jewelry instead to put in this one!!! Better than pictured. The black leather is soft and lovely and the cream colored interior is a beautiful contrast. So sad to return. I know she would have loved it. I may just keep it for myself.......
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this purchase. it works for my dainty jewelry pieces and with gaudier pieces there is places for them it just depends on where you decide to place it. It is stylish and so cute and the little travel box is being used as a box for my daughter and its cute that it matches mommies! I would buy this again for her when she's older and as a gift for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Latch fell apart after a handful of uses
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift last year. I love the size and compartments but it isn’t long lasting. Christmas Eve this year I tried to open it and the latch sprung off the case in several pieces that we weren’t able to reassemble. So now I have a travel case that won’t close rendering it useless. I only travelled twice last year so it was hardly even used. Would have been great if it had lasted
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Perfect jewelry organizer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she loves it. Fits all her stuff perfectly. Quality is really great as well. This is my third product from this company and I wouldn’t have an issue buying any of their jewelry poach again. They make great products with amazing quality and durability. A little big for traveling for me, because I don’t like a lot of luggage but I definitely recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: LSCB

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy for my daughter’s birthday!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter’s birthday so she could have something nice quality and fancy for her jewelry. Looks like it’ll last for years. She loves having a lock box. It’s very roomy for all her earrings and stuff. Great product and very pretty. I bought the white because she’ll be a teen soon and may want to paint or draw on it. I want one for myself now honestly. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: I❤️MyWife!

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: The feel of the material is very nice and I actually am able to put 3 watches, which not a lot of other items make room for. The earring slots are removable which makes it easier to put earrings into them, but only small earrings. The cons are that the mirror was a waste to put it there cause you can't see your whole face with earrings on and the necklaces if they are too bulky would allow the sides to close, but other than that it is a very good item. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: YoungProfessional606

customer_reviews.title: Quality feels really nice!
customer_reviews.text: VERY nice quality for the price! Very roomy for plenty of jewelry! Super nice features to this jewelry box. VERY happy with purchase when compared to other comparable boxes that are more expensive than this one was. I am SURE that the granddaughter will like it a LOT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jola L. James

customer_reviews.title: Only small watches fit
customer_reviews.text: Lots of storage. I ordered black but a white one arrived which I was bummed for—but I’ve been needing it for so long, I’m just going to keep the white. It also came with a bit of a corner dent. Functionality is pretty good. If you have bulky watches, you won’t like the watch compartment. I have an Invicta dive watch that absolutely will not fit. My main watch (normal bezel for a women’s watch- bracelet style) does not adjust and also don’t fit. If you have a very thin style—it will work. The small compact box it comes with is nice for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Jewel Box
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the quality of this jewel box. I bought it for my sister in white. I am going to order one for myself I am so happy with the box. It is beautiful and the quality is excellent. Even has a box you can use for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Lettieri

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece on her 5th birthday because she had her ears pierced. It is a beautiful box that she can leave on her dresser top and she loves it. There is enough storage for essentials for sure. She fell in love with it and it feels like it could be great case to hold on to for many years. It is a classic look and feel. I am glad I bought this one for her.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Koch

customer_reviews.title: Tower fall
customer_reviews.text: Plastic connectors bent and one day after putting up tower down . Waste of time organizing shoes All down mess now
customer_reviews.author: network

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my wife and she absolutely loves it. Fits a lot of items and has a really nice travel pack that pulls out so you don’t need to take the whole box. It also looks really nice
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely compact and good quality. I have too much jewelry but managed to pack it all away in this box. I set aside the travel pouch for when I‘ll use it. Haven’t tested the lock since I won’t be locking this but I like the pouches to tuck the hanging necklaces and the numerous ring slots. Wish there were more earring dividers, but otherwise a perfect organized compliment to my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Great for Organization
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry box has so many different compartments, and I love that they're different sizes. The sides that unfold for necklace storage are very efficient at keeping the chains untangled. The quality is durable, so you don't have to worry about it breaking open or anything when carrying it. And the travel case it comes with is the perfect size. Overall, this product is worth the money if you're looking for lots of storage and a minimalistic appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and helping to keep me organized
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying my jewelry box! Its a decent size and holds all my jewelry nicely. I appreciate all the compartments and areas to store necklaces, which can hang and avoid getting tangled. I also really love how it comes with a small traveling case, which I used this past weekend. It was perfect for bringing a couple of pieces on my trip. I would highly recommend, especially for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Y.

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous with more space than you think!
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels lush, lining is soft and prevents jewelry from sliding around, and there are so many ways to configure the compartments (which there are so many of BTW) AND there is even the smaller box that could be for special items, or a travel case. EXCELLENT PURCHASE! I’ve had it two days and I’m already raving to my girlfriends.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, handy product!
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this purchase. I have a TON of jewelry both real and costume and it is the perfect organizer for everything. It even comes with a watch compartment! You just have to make sure you have the room for it on your dresser or something, but otherwise, I am very happy with it. It's good quality too, so I'm pretty sure I will have this product for many, many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Zizzy

customer_reviews.title: Good for earrings, bracelets and rings. Not for necklaces.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful jewellery box that is very well made! There is a lot of storage for rings, earrings and bracelets but the necklace holders are only good for short, thin necklaces. If you have any chunky or long necklaces, then there isn't really room for them. But if you have a separate necklace tree, then there is no problem! I also like the travel jewellery case!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great jewelry box for all kinds of jewelry
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 8 year old daughter as Christmas present. She had lots of necklaces that would get tangled. This solves that problem & has ample space for earrings, rings, bracelets etc. she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Burns

customer_reviews.title: Only slightly disappointed because the box said it was inspected for quality ...
customer_reviews.text: The box is very elegant and lots of space. Only slightly disappointed because the box said it was inspected for quality and one of the drawer tracks was broken so the drawer isn't straight. Ill have to glue it. Love the mini jewelry box. Now i just have to get some more jewelry to fill it up
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: The box wont stay closed
customer_reviews.text: This box looks great from the outside and the inside....but it has one fatal flaw! The box doesnt close. If you hold it by the handle, the lid opens and everything comes crashing out. Thankfully I had nothing in the box when I tested this! It's great otherwise. The design is nice and the material feels good, but if the jewelry box cant close theres no point!
customer_reviews.author: Zahra

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I know there dimensions, but it was a bit smaller than I measured. Regardless, it has plenty of compartments and gets the job done for some jewelry storage.
customer_reviews.author: Lkimba75

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself & I love it. I’ve never had a nice jewelry box so I took my time looking for a nice one and I’m glad I found this one. It is going to last me a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Stordahl

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this for me for Christmas and I absolutely love it! I don't have a ton of jewelry so this box fit the bill. It looks sleek, very well constructed and I see it lasting me for a very long time. I also love the traveling case it comes with, it will be nice to have a good case to bring my jewelry with me on trips. If you are a huge jewelry fan and have a ton of it you should get something bigger, but this one was just right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my granddaughter. She absolutely loves it! I thought she might prefer one with a music box and dancing ballerina but I'm so glad I chose this one instead. She loves all the little nooks and crannies to store things in and the little travel case that comes with it!
customer_reviews.author: mvb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I really needed a new jewelry box and this one is just perfect. I got it in the mail recently and finally opened it up. I love how it has so many compartments and a small jewelry case inside too ! It’s perfect for all my jewelry: necklaces, watches, rings, earrings, etc.. can’t wait to fill this baby up. I highly recommended !
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.text: I love all the compartments and velvet. Their shipping was OUTSTANDING! Amazon quoted me Monday-Thursday. I got it on the Saturday before!! It’s very nice! The only thing is that the drawers didn’t aline and when I pulled out the drawers to inspect, the part inside completely came out. The glue didn’t hold at all. 💔
customer_reviews.author: krayziekelz4ya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Everything I have ever wanted. My jewelry was starting to get extremely messy and all over the place. I've always wanted a jewelry box so of course I came to Amazon. This beauty is everything I could have asked for. And the travel case is perfect for my many earring studs. This works perfect for my needs. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Jbelcher

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this! Even though it's more than I wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this! Even though it's more than I wanted to spend, I instantly knew it was worth every dollar. My only qualm: there needs to be more space for necklaces. I could barely fit mine. I ended up hanging them across all four of the "hooks" longways and was able to fit about 3 chain necklaces on each side. I had a few thicker statement/bib necklaces that I had to stuff in the pouch in the top above the earrings. The travel case is such a nice addition and so much safer than throwing your jewelry in a zip-lock as I've always done! Would definitely recommend to any accessory enthusiast!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Knox

customer_reviews.title: Comes as described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for organizing a mass amount of jewelery. It has a place for everything, except for me the earrings were difficult so I had to lay them inside the drawers. It's sleek and takes up less space and definitely helps get everything organized for easy accessibility. I also like that it has a lock and key!
customer_reviews.author: HB4867

customer_reviews.title: She really liked it especially because of all the compartments which will ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mom. She really liked it especially because of all the compartments which will fit her jewelry and sets all in one place. Very good buy if you need to organize your jewelry. And it also comes with a lock for safety.
customer_reviews.author: ccsmilz

customer_reviews.title: Great jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry box is stunning! I really needed a place to put my jewelry and accessories and decided to try this particular one after reading other reviews. The quality is great and the travel case is very convenient as well. I even found that the travel box can fit in the vanity for when you come home and just want to take jewelry off temporarily and conveniently in your purse for traveling and on the go! I highly recommend this set to all. It's a great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: tonacity

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn't expect this to be as nice as it is. I thought it would have been terribly made but I was wrong! This jewelry box is perfect. I can fit so many things inside and it looks sleek as well!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Lots of jewelry storage
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! My daughter loves this. She is able to hold all of her jewelry. It's a good quality with many compartments. She loves the smaller travel pack too
customer_reviews.author: Julie Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great layout, quality slightly lacking
customer_reviews.text: I like the functionality And layout of the box. Able to store my entire collection and it fits in our safe perfectly! The outer material scratches easy since it isn’t made of a durable material, but the box itself should hold up fine with gentle use. It isn’t the most quality jewelry box out there, but functionality wins and I just needed something better than keeping everything in individual store boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Hunt

customer_reviews.title: As is and what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as stated in product description. Small travel case came with some damage (see photos). Otherwise what I expected/needed. No damage to the other parts.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Brisson

customer_reviews.title: It's really neat and it does organize my jewelry but.....
customer_reviews.text: It just doesn't fit any necklaces. The only way it can fit any is if I fold the necklace chain a few times and hang it to the sides of the jewerly box. Also, if you have long earrings.. this box just might not be the one because it just doesnt have enough space as I thought it would. Nevertheless, it does do what its supposed to do and it came wrapped nicely. I did like that it came with a lock and a set of keys.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This came on time, packaged nicely. It doesn't smudge or have marks when fingers touch the outer leather-like material. It holds alot for its size. It seems very well made and should last a very long time. A bonus for me is how incredibly soft the velvet material is inside. I would certainly recommend this jewelry box!
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Well organized. Love the to go smaller box. Looks great. The inside is not as pink as I was worried about. The brand name on the latch I don't like but it's not a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer with a pretty style.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter in-law for Christmas. I was looking for something not too big so it could sit on a dresser without blocking a lot of the mirror or take up a lot of space. It also had to hold and organize a lot of jewelry. This fits the bill!! It’s also very pretty with a soft leather like exterior. She loves it. I would buy it again. Really liked the cream color too.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome find!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful surprise this jewelry box is! It’s beautiful, beautifully made! I can’t wait to give this to my daughter on Christmas Day!!
customer_reviews.author: angiest

customer_reviews.title: ... price at how much this can hold and how nice it is
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised for the price at how much this can hold and how nice it is! It's working perfectly for what I needed and looks so much more grown up and professional than what you normally find for jewelry boxes. You could even travel with it easily!
customer_reviews.author: SC23

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these for my daughters and then decided to buy another for myself. Great jewelry box to keep items in that you don't wear daily that normally lay on your dresser or hang on hooks. Nice travel container inside to take on trips. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: TKIFC - Crawmomma

customer_reviews.title: Honestly I was extremely satisfied with this box
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was extremely satisfied with this box, it was a lot bigger in person than in the photo though which was a nice surprise. Definatly worth the money, the inside was extremely soft and on top of that the outside looks and feels a lot like smooth leather. I was about to fit all of my earring and more expensive jewelry into it with plenty of room to spare. Something else I didn't expect was that the keys actually worked, I figured the keys would work a lot oke how cheap diary keys do but honestly you can lock and unlock the box in one turn. 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.author: crafter life

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it all my jewelry fits great, and is protected. I like the velvet lining. I purchased another for my sister, the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Gogo24

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for our teenage niece. She loves it. The box has different compartments, nice material. We got her the white one. Rather large and heavy, but it will fit all her accessories.
customer_reviews.author: mella

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: It holds jewelry fine. I don't like the mobile "walls" on the earring compartments. But I guess someone would like the fact that they can be removed to create larger sections.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter - she picked it out and loves it. Lots of trays and spaces for all her jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Happiness
customer_reviews.text: What a smile the teen granddaughter had for Christmas she loved it. Simple things in life make a child happy.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara jean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect and very pretty. Served all my needs and ones I didn't think of. Reccomend completely.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Fequiere

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, lots of compartments.
customer_reviews.text: You’re able to hang many necklaces on the side flaps and the smaller box is perfect when just going away for a night or two. I travel a lot and like most gals I like my jewelry with me to wear. I haven’t had to untangle a necklace since I bought this, places for rings and earrings as well. Super handy.
customer_reviews.author: LYNN BINDER

customer_reviews.title: Useful product
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my sister and she absolutely loves it. The little travel case it comes with is very handy .
customer_reviews.author: STango

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: It feels luxurious even though it's faux leather. I am impressed with the quality for the price. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Melany

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful :)
customer_reviews.text: I received this yesterday, one day before the estimated delivery date, and I love it. It looks exactly like the picture, and it has a lot of space! Usually things don't look the same in real life from the picture, but I was actually surprised with this! I am very pleased with it. I do not see how anyone can't like it unless they have a lot of jewelry and need a lot of extra space. You will not regret this purchase. Thank you so much for this product. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great box
customer_reviews.text: Love this box! cute, clean, and all the pieces are there. Looks just like the picture. One of the sides that holds the drawers was off but I just used my glue gun to put it back. No issues with me!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Harris

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: What a great jewelry box! It has tons of storage and closes up into a nice carrying case as well. My 9-year old daughter is getting this for Christmas 2017 and I know she will enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Dreajmartin

customer_reviews.title: ... my little stud pairs but so far I am happily impressed! Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned that this would not hold all my little stud pairs but so far I am happily impressed! Looks great! Feels fairly sturdy, ( but i would not give to a young child, seems like it would bot take much playtime abuse. ) overall happy!!
customer_reviews.author: LEO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality and Organization I’m pretty sure I saw the exact same one at Pottery Barn for $300 lol
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Good storage option
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this jewelry box! It has many different sized compartments and fully closes so that you can transport it if you need to. It’s not the highest quality product but is very much worth what you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Apple Crisp

customer_reviews.title: Solid Purchas
customer_reviews.text: I have a TON of jewelry and this fits everything. I really didn't think it would, thought I'd have to downsizr and pick and choose pieces. Well made, but beware, white will scuff easily and it's fake leather and looks like fake leather
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: Broken and glued when I recieved item
customer_reviews.text: Broken when I recieved item. The entire box is poorly glued together. The shelves are coming unglued and are crooked. Immediately returning this. I should have listened to others reviews.
customer_reviews.author: katemarie1

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this jewelry organizer. At first I was nervous it would be flimsy but it fits everything I have perfectly and seems like it’ll last me a while. Definitely go for it if you’re looking for a simple but clean organizer, you won’t be disappointed. The only thing that isn’t my favorite is how hard it is to open the size parts where you can hang necklaces but hopefully that will get easier with time.
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value & Incredible price!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this jewelry box. It hold all of my rings, studs and watches. It even holds some necklaces. I keep my diamond bracelets in the top pull out drawer. The only other thing I could wish for is that it had a display for earrings but you can't have everything. I love the look and feel of this box and I highly recommend it for yourself or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. Doesn't take up too much space. Holds a good bit of jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Kia murphie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 17 year old grand daughter for Christmas and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L. Blum

Guess that's not going to happen! I HOPE this will somebody who is looking for a jewelry box, one that will lock!

product_meta.title: SONGMICS Jewelry Box for Women, Jewelry Organizer with 2 Drawers, Lockable Jewelry Case with Mirror, Portable Travel Case, for Rings, Earrings, Necklaces, Gift, Black UJBC121B
feature_bullets: YOUR JEWELS DESERVE THE BEST: All of your earrings, bracelets, and rings piling up on the shelf or dresser? Beautiful trinkets can't just be shoved into a dark drawer or hung on a nail, they require a stylish jewelry box for safe keeping

WHAT CAN BE PLACED INSIDE? With 2 drawers, 2 side doors for necklaces, and many storage compartments for rings and accessories, this 10.2" x 6.7" x 7.1" jewelry case rescues you from taking 20 minutes to untangle what you want to wear
MINI CASE FOR YOUR NEXT TRIP: This jewelry box has a mini travel case, which is perfect for applying makeup on the go; it’s petite enough that you can pop it in your bag for a weekend at the beach

TAILORED FOR YOU: With a simple & stylish design, this SONGMICS jewelry box will be a practical gift for jewelry & accessories lovers, a good choice as Mother’s Day gifts; their eyes will fill with cheer after they see it!
100% SATISFACTION: Our professional customer service is always at your disposal; so don’t wait any longer, get this jewelry box home and brighten up your dressing area
